snippet: The 114th Congress took up its first bill to impose changes to the Affordable Care Act on Thursday, with the House of Representatives passing legislation to expand the definition of a workweek to 40 hours, from 30.
abstract: The 114th Congress took up its first bill to impose changes to the Affordable Care Act on Thursday, with the House of Representatives passing legislation to expand the definition of a workweek to 40 hours, from 30.

headline.main: House Passes Bill to Alter Health Law's Workweek Provision

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
